data.oai_dc:dc: This file provides documentation for file96BOMOCT.DAT, an ASCII file that contains final data for chlorophyll concentrationsof Schistidium agassizii and Hygrohypnum spp. retrieved from the Kuparuk River. In1996, weekly, from 22-Jun to 10-Aug, collections of bryophytes from 3 riffles eachtreatment reach (i.e. reference, recovery, and fertilized).
